title: Yamaha YAS-62III Professional Alto Saxophone - Lacquer Finish
description: The Yamaha YAS-62III Professional Alto Saxophone with a lacquer finish is an exceptional instrument favored by professionals and serious students. It offers excellent response, accurate intonation, and a rich, warm tone. The YAS-62III features an improved low B-C# connection and an adjustable thumb rest for added comfort. The high-quality brass construction and durable lacquer finish ensure reliable performance for years to come. This saxophone is ideal for solo performances, jazz ensembles, and orchestral settings. Its consistent playability and beautiful sound make it a standout choice for any saxophonist.
meta_title: Yamaha YAS-62III Professional Alto Saxophone - Lacquer Finish
meta_description: Shop the Yamaha YAS-62III Professional Alto Saxophone, featuring an improved low B-C# connection, adjustable thumb rest, and durable lacquer finish. Ideal for professionals and serious students. Buy now at a special price!

Its high-quality brass construction and stunning silver-plated finish ensure reliable performance and a striking appearance. Suitable for a variety of musical genres, from jazz to classical, this saxophone is a versatile and valuable addition to any musician's collection.
